com.github.astefanich.broker.simple

Class SimpleOrderManager

  • Object
    • SimpleOrderManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrderManager

    public final class SimpleOrderManager
extends Object
implements OrderManager
    Maintains a pair of PricedOrder queues, of types StopBuyOrder and StopSellOrder. Orders and request the execution of orders when the price conditions allow their execution.
    Author:
    AndrewStefanich
    See Also:
    PricedOrder, StopSellOrder, StopBuyOrder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleOrderManager(String stockSymbolTicker, int initialPrice)
      Constructs a SimpleOrderManager, and instantiates two order queues with thresholds at the given price.

                          int initialPrice)
        Constructs a SimpleOrderManager, and instantiates two order queues with thresholds at the given price.
        Parameters:
        stockSymbolTicker - the ticker symbol of the stock this instance manages orders for
        initialPrice - the current price of the stock to be managed

      • setBuyOrderProcessor

        public void setBuyOrderProcessor(Consumer<StopBuyOrder> processor)
        Registers the processor to be used during order processing. This will be passed on to the order queues as the dispatch callback.
        Specified by:
